evidence.claim: Icon Home Health utilizes AWS cloud services for its infrastructure.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring the privacy of patient health information.
Icon Home Health supports FHIR standards for health data exchange.
The use of X12 transaction sets is indicated in their billing processes.
They implement REST APIs for system integrations and third-party service connections.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 for healthcare transactions, interested in API automation and clearinghouse functions.
